DOC.brief_summary: This study determine highly selective enkephalinergic receptor modulator effective treatment anxious major depressive disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Study Antidepressant Efficacy Selective , High Affinity Enkephalinergic Agonist Anxious Major Depressive Disorder ( AMDD )
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent prior study specific procedure Diagnosis major depressive disorder without psychotic feature ( MDD ) A history substance alcohol abuse within past 6 month dependence within 1 year enrollment define DSMIV criterion . Women pregnant lactate History pancreatitis
